name: Personal Project Templates
description: A comprehensive template collection with todo app evolution, documentation, visual assets, reusable components, utilities, API docs, and deployment configurations

messages.content: Can you help me create a simple todo app?
I'll create a simple todo app for you! This will be a basic version with core functionality - adding, completing, and deleting tasks.
This is good, but can you make it more colorful and visually appealing?
Absolutely! I've updated the todo app with beautiful gradients, colors, and improved styling. Much more visually appealing now!
Love the colors! Can you add some smooth animations and transitions?
Perfect! I've added smooth animations, hover effects, bounce animations, and staggered delays. The todo app now feels alive and interactive!
Amazing! Can you add advanced features like priority levels, statistics, and filtering?

Excellent idea! I've created the ultimate todo app with priority levels, real-time statistics, progress tracking, filtering options, and task metadata. This shows the full evolution from simple to advanced!
This is great! Could you also create a documentation template for personal projects?
Absolutely! I'll create a comprehensive markdown template for documenting personal projects. It includes sections for goals, progress tracking, technical stack, and lessons learned.
And maybe a visual template or logo for branding?
Great idea! I've created a beautiful SVG template with gradient backgrounds and professional styling that can be used for project branding or as a visual artifact template.
This is amazing! Now that I have a full todo app, could you help me extract the styling into a reusable CSS component library?

Excellent idea! I'll create a modular CSS component library that extracts all the beautiful styling from your todo app into reusable components. This will make it easy to maintain consistent design across multiple projects.
Perfect! Could you also create some JavaScript utilities that I can reuse across different projects?
Absolutely! I'll create a utility library with common functions for DOM manipulation, local storage, animations, and data management that you can use in any project.
As my projects grow, I'll need backend APIs. Could you create an API documentation template?

Great forward thinking! I'll create a comprehensive API documentation template with examples, authentication details, and interactive examples that will be perfect for documenting your backend services.
Finally, could you create some deployment configuration files to help me deploy these projects?
Perfect! I'll create deployment configuration templates for multiple platforms including Docker, Netlify, and Vercel, so you can easily deploy your projects anywhere.

versions.description: v1: Basic todo app with core functionality
v2: Added beautiful colors and gradients
v3: Enhanced with smooth animations and effects
v4: Advanced features - priorities, stats, filtering
